body:
> PS note that if referring to this link https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/24867/ I couldn't find a link to https://github.com/golang/proposal/blob/master/design/16339-alias-decls.md or maybe I am not used to the go-review interface.

A closer look reveals that the project is `proposal` (i.e. the [proposal](https://github.com/golang/proposal) sub-repo) and the path of the added file is `design/16339-alias-decls.md`, thus https://github.com/golang/proposal/blob/master/design/16339-alias-decls.md
